The cheese slices were submitted to different periods of immersion (immediate removal or removal after 30 min), then placed in Petri dishes and inoculated with fungal suspension containing between 10 4 and 10 5 spores of fungus. Finally, the slices were stored at room temperature (25 °C) or under refrigeration (4 °C ± 1 °C). All experiments were performed in duplicate. The described methodology was modified from Taniwaki et al.
